metadata.title: CVE-2024-38536 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine. A memory allocation failuredue to `http.memcap` being reached leads to a NULL-ptr reference leading toa crash. Upgrade to 7.0.6.

criterions.comment: suricata package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
